game_description: Cheerful Chimps is an online game where you are a monkey and you can climb, play minigames with your friends, and much more!
review_1: Really good game it is fun entertaining and most people ask for mod witch ends up in a ban or report
review_2: The "co-owner" or a moderator tried to ban me and I have the recording so good luck explaining that to the owner bud
review_3: I love the game because I'm a moderator
review_4: This game is absolutely amazing with a good fan base and modeling , a may not be at its prime but has a lot of potential!
review_5: This is a nice game but I have come, across a moderator who kept kicking me because I was telling jokes.
